name: MTLColorWriteMask
desc: Values used to specify a mask to permit or restrict writing to color channels of a color value. The values red, green, blue, and alpha select one color channel each, and they can be bitwise combined.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns a new color write mask from a specified raw value.

items.name: static var red: MTLColorWriteMask
items.desc: The red color channel is enabled.

items.name: static var green: MTLColorWriteMask
items.desc: The green color channel is enabled.

items.name: static var blue: MTLColorWriteMask
items.desc: The blue color channel is enabled.

items.name: static var alpha: MTLColorWriteMask
items.desc: The alpha color channel is enabled.
